insight: No 'ghost orders' were detected. The identified anomalies are standard product returns. SOP-LOG-002 outlines procedures for 'late returns during Peak' but does not define or address 'ghost orders'. Further investigation would be needed if 'ghost orders' refer to discrepancies beyond physical returns.

Total of 298 unauthorized discount instances detected. Cannot filter by year 2019 with current tools. According to SOP-FIN-003: Pricing and Discount Policy, unauthorized discounts >15% require Regional Director approval and trigger a financial audit. Recommend reviewing discount approval process and conducting an internal audit.

Anomaly: 298 Unauthorized Discounts. SOP-FIN-003: Pricing and Discount Policy states unauthorized discounts >15% require Regional Director approval and trigger a financial audit. Recommend reviewing approval process and initiating audits.

Anomaly: 100 Return Anomalies. SOP-LOG-002: E-commerce Fulfillment Standards states that for late returns during Peak, waive shipping fees and offer 10% courtesy coupon. Recommend reviewing return process to ensure adherence to this policy and maintain customer satisfaction.
